Description: Short length of narrow, undyed linen tape, with pale-blue and white threads; Warp: S spun linen, 6 threads per 5m, order of warp threads, 1 single blue thread, 1 pair undyed threads, 1 pair undyed threads, 1 blue single thread; Weft: S spun blue linen, c.4tpc; Edges: two simple selvedges, others ragged
Curator's comments: Unreg. 22; Similar to Unreg. 21; Found 1988? In the Keeper's Office, previous location cupbaord O; Probably used to secure burial wrappings; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (5.2.1991)
